channel.title: Comments on: Life and Death Of and In the Astoria

item.title: By: nathan
item.dc:creator: nathan
item.content:encoded:
And nearing the end of the Astoria.

As seen from the demolition-in-progress at the Elks Lodge/Moose Lodge/Royal Club, September 1962.

The Hillcrest, which once stood between the Astoria and the Elks Lodge, was demolished in September 1961.

item.title: By: nathan
item.dc:creator: nathan
item.content:encoded:
A magnificent view looking up Olive, with, coming at us, the Hillcrest, Angels Flight, and a good-sized chunk of the BPOE Lodge.

From this page of AVTOLA.
